definition[0]: if an agreement or official document is renewable, you can make it continue for a further period of time after it ends
example[0]: It’s a six-month lease but it’s renewable.
definition[1]: renewable energy replaces itself naturally, or is easily replaced because there is a large supply of it
example[2]: renewable energy such as solar power
example[3]: an industry based on renewable resources
definition[2]: renewable materials, sources of energy etc will continue to exist or will grow again and are therefore never used up
example[4]: investments in renewable energy projects such as solar power
definition[3]: a contract, agreement, deal etc that is renewable can be continued
example[5]: Make sure the policy is annually renewable with reasonable rate increases.
